docs.title: Syllabus
docs.text:
Download the full PDF: ENME480 Syllabus{target=_blank}

Highlights

  • Lecture + studio/lab format
  • Two midterms and a vision-based final project
  • Canvas and Piazza for communications

docs.title: Welcome to ENME480 (FA 2025)
docs.text: This is our course site. Check Schedule for week-by-week updates.

docs.title: Labs
docs.text: Each lab page includes objectives, setup, steps, and deliverables. Code snippets have a one-click copy button.

docs.title: Objectives
docs.text:
• Verify environment setup
  • Run a minimal control loop

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
Pre-reqs

  • Clone the lab submodule (automatically checked out by CI)
  • Install Python 3.10+ and required packages

docs.title: Steps
docs.text:
PythonCLI hello_control.py
import time
print("Starting control loop...")
for i in range(3):
    print(f"tick {i}")
    time.sleep(0.5)

python hello_control.py
